dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Kotaro... What happened to you..? I need to find him. I'm going to the dungeon. But first I need to take this book with me. Who knows, it could be helpful.

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: I'm scared... I need to stay with you! There are monsters everywhere...

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Shhh, calm down, I'm here now. Nothing will happen to you. Where are your parents?

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Not here... I'm here on a visit to see uncle Tadanari-san. He told me to wait here for his return. Said he had to take care of something important.

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: I see. You talked about monsters earlier. Where are they? I don't see any...

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: You just received a letter, right? A big monster slipped it under your door and then left.

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Did you see where it was headed towards?

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: I think it was flying towards uncle Tadanari-san's dungeon...

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Let's head there then. I will get you back to safety and ask him some questions about my brother.

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Look, he dropped something!

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Great, I really need this.

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Are you ok Renjiro-chan?

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Yes Yuki-nee. Did we kill the monster? Will it come back to hurt us?

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: It won't be able to hurt us anymore, don't worry.

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: What’s in the bag, nee-chan?

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: I need it to make a weapon that could protect us against those monsters. The Powder of sacred Flames. Two ingredients are left to find. Let's go now, I need to finish what my brother started.

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: So much blood...

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Yes, Ren-chan. I really hope it's not Tadanari-sama's.

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Stay close to me. I think it's observing us.

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Did you hear-

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Yes. It's above us.

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: You come seeking truth. But are you ready for it's weight?

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: At last, you succeeded truth seeker. Two questions you may ask.

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Truth seeker? You aren't going to fight us?

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: No, I don't hurt those who seek wisdom.

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: What is the second ingredient for the Powder of flames?

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: The Powder of sacred flames, you seek? I see. A yokai's body part is what you are looking for.

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: A yokai's body part..? How?

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: Don't you worry, here take a feather of mine, you deserve it.

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Thank you mister owl, did it hurt?

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: "Sighs" Proud would Kotaro be, for his task to be perpetuated...

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: You know my brother?! Where is he? What happened to him?

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: Kotaro refused the flame. He chose morals. To my greatest sadness, your lord chose punishment through the blade.

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: My brother... he was executed?

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: Do not worry, for Fukurō chose vengeance.

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Did he harm my uncle nee-san?

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: I am afraid he did Ren-chan... He got punished for his sins towards my brother.

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: Sister of my friend, I grant you one more question. In honor of Kotaro.

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Thank you owl-san... What can I do to finish what my brother started?

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: Heading towards the mausoleum you must. The last ingredient there will be discovered. But be aware, the price to pay may not be worth it...

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Thank you mister owl. Even if you hurt my uncle, you are a kind monster!

dialog.speaker: Fukurō
dialog.text: May the winds of destiny cover your feathers young-lings.

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Maybe we could become friends with them Yuki-nee? He was really nice!

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: Maybe...

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Where are we exactly Yuki-nee?

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: We are in a mausoleum Ren-chan. When you lose someone, you come here to honor them and pray for them.

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Then we should pray for Kotaro-chan and uncle Tadanari...

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: In time we will Ren-chan. I promise you.

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: I think we can already put the two ingredients we have on the altars and see what happens..?

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: "To beat the forces of evil, the Powder of sacred flames is the only way. To create the flames of salvation, you must gather : Ashes of a Yokai's body part, and the life essence of a young and pure soul. Once the ingredients gathered, you must place them on the 3 sarcrificial altars. For the last ingredient, the-"

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: I-,It can't be...

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: What is it nee-chan? You look so white...

dialog.speaker: Yukiko
dialog.text: This is madness...

dialog.speaker: Renjiro
dialog.text: Yuki-nee..? You're scaring me...
